title: Is it mandatory to rinse mouth and nose in wudu? What if the nose is blocked? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: munna says while making Woodill is it mandated to rinse your mouth and nose my nose is blocked most of the time and I'm not able to sniff water into the nostrils properly how should I do this during will do you should try your level best and this is more than enough Allah doesn't tell us to bring the hose and shove it up our nostrils and put the pressure of water to flush it this is too extreme Allah simply says to us that sniffing inhale water up your nostrils to the best of your ability if your nose is blocked so be it there's nothing else you can do
